title: Dalit woman raped, filmed, forced to eat beef by two Muslim men in Uttar Pradesh
selftext:
[Dalit woman raped, filmed, forced to eat beef by two Muslim men in Uttar Pradesh - India Today](https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/uttar-pradesh-dalit-woman-raped-forced-to-eat-beef-by-two-muslim-men-2432742-2023-09-08)   
Liberals tell me where did your secularism go that you aren't even talking about this?
comments: As a secular these guys should undergo the worst possible torcher in mankind

https://reddit.com/r/india/s/I8Hcd5VOmt


Here, like geez learn how to use search on reddit. It's not even that old.

Liberals talk about cases where government is NOT taking action. Like in Manipur. It took months for FIRs to be filled. Like with the the wrestlers. Same situation. FIRs were filled months later.

Read the article you have shared.

>  All the accused have been arrested,"

Hope that explains things.
You're human being  before being  classified  as a secular  or  non secular  individual  .Nd such scums should get the worst form of punishment  for all one cares

Educated enough to make this post but not sincere enough to do a simple search.

That's OP.  

There are millions like him and they vote. Scary.

Why would they? OP only cares about making allegations and then disappearing when challenged. If someone’s only post about a horrific incidence is about how some people did not react to it then they clearly only care about their agenda.
